items.title: Patients to benefit from new 3-D visualizations of the heart
items.summary: In the future heart surgeons will have access to a new type of 3-D visualization of the cardiac conduction system. This technique could provide improved safety for patients and improve surgical outcomes in patients suffering from heart disease and cardiac malformations, explains a new report.

alternate.title: Patients to benefit from new 3-D visualizations of the heart

items.title: Biophysics study makes exciting advancements for the future of DNA sequencing
items.summary: New technology that optimizes DNA sequencing using nanophysics and electric currents has been developed by scientists. Their work offers a method for loading DNA into sequencing wells with orders of magnitude higher efficiencies.

alternate.title: Biophysics study makes exciting advancements for the future of DNA sequencing

items.title: Scientists list 50 terms you may be confusing
items.summary: A list of commonly used psychological terms that are often assumed to be similar, if not identical, but which refer to very different concepts has been revealed by new research.

alternate.title: Scientists list 50 terms you may be confusing

items.title: Study clarifies how neural nets 'think' when processing language
items.summary: A new general-purpose technique has been developed for making sense of neural networks that are trained to perform natural-language-processing tasks, in which computers attempt to interpret freeform texts written in ordinary, or 'natural,' language (as opposed to a structured language, such as a database-query language).

alternate.title: Study clarifies how neural nets 'think' when processing language
